game

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    The Board is a 15x15 matrix of Squares.
    Author:
    Katarina Cvetkovic, 18347921, Tee Chee Guan, 18202044, Rajit Banerjee, 18202817 Team 15: DarkMode

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board()
      Creates a new Scrabble board.

      • getHorizontalWord

        public java.lang.String getHorizontalWord(int row,
                                          int startColumn,
                                          int endColumn)
        Gets the word on the board in given row, starting and ending at given columns.
        Parameters:
        row - the board row in which the word is placed
        startColumn - the starting board column of the word
        endColumn - the ending board column of the word
        Returns:
        the String representation of the word

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Check if board contains no tiles.
        Returns:
        true if board is empty

      • isWordLegal

        public boolean isWordLegal(Word word,
                           Frame frame)
        Determines if a word placement is legal or not.
        Parameters:
        word - to be placed on the board
        frame - the players frame
        Returns:
        true if word placement is legal

      • placeTile

        public void placeTile(char column,
                      int row,
                      Tile tile)
        Place a given Tile at a specified row and column on the Board. Add the index of the Tile to the list of last placed indices.
        Parameters:
        column - character between 'A' - 'O' to specify the board column
        row - integer between 1 - 15 to specify the board row
        tile - the Tile to be placed at the specified index

      • placeWord

        public void placeWord(Word word,
                      Frame frame)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Place a given word either vertically or horizontally starting at a specified row and column on the board.
        Parameters:
        word - to be placed on the board
        frame - the players frame
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if word placement is illegal

      • setFirstMove

        public void setFirstMove(boolean firstMove)
        Setter for firstMove.
        Parameters:
        firstMove - boolean value indicating whether the first move has been played
